Pre-Game Insights: De Bruyne and Doku will again support the central striker
It seems to be a straight fight between Dodi Lukebakio and Johan Bakayoko to feature on the right flank
Arsenal's Leandro Trossard was not called up
Openda's place up front seems certain
An all-Aston Villa midfield of Andre Onana and Youri Tielemans should be retained too

Tedesco offered several youngsters a chance to shine in the Red Devils' opener, and Maxim De Cuyper could again start at left-back, with Arne Engels, Zeno Debast and talented teenager Julien Duranville all contenders to make another appearance from the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thibaut Courtois still missing due to a longstanding rift with Tedesco
Romelu Lukaku is also unavailable this month after a summer of transfer turmoil impacted his fitness
Captain Kevin De Bruyne will be present in Lyon
Lois Openda ultimately took and missed a penalty
